reporting-org.narrative: International Committee of the Red Cross

title.narrative: ICRC operations by the Syrian Arab Republic Delegation(2021 Unaudited)

description.narrative: We are distributing food and other essentials to the people in Syria who are facing extremely difficult conditions because of the conflict and crisisSyria crisis: The ICRC is helping both people inside Syria, who are facing extremely difficult conditions because of the conflict, and the hundreds of thousands of Syrian refugees in Jordan, Lebanon, and Iraq.In cooperation with the Syrian Arab Red Crescent, we are distributing food and other essentials, restoring water supplies, and supporting medical services.

participating-org.narrative: International Committee of the Red Cross

organisation.narrative: International Committee of the Red Cross (ICRC)

mailing-address.narrative: 19 Avenue de la paix, 1202 Geneva, Switzerland
